Adrian walked out the door and down the steps, past the group dinner goers who pretended not to entirely notice him. Neither Freddie nor Alexis, Samantha, Summer nor Nia, was very much interested in extending an invitation. Not after the *last dance* scene last Thursday.  

“Hey,” said Jonah. “Want to come to dinner?”

“Oh, I have something actually.”

“Boo.”
